import React from "react"; import banner from "../../Images/slider-Banner.jpg"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import play from "../../Images/play_circle.png"; import sliderControl from "../../Images/slider-control.jpg"; import "./banner.css"; import { api_key, fetchDataFromServer } from "../../Api"; function Banner() { const pageContent = document.querySelector("[page-content]"); fetchDataFromServer( `https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/popular?api_key=${api_key}&page=1`, heroBanner ); const heroBanner = function ({ results: movielist }) { const banner = document.createElement("section"); banner.classList.add("banner"); banner.ariaLabel = "Popular Movies"; banner.innerHTML = html``; let controlItemIndex = 0; for (const [index, movie] of movielist.entries()) { const { backdrop_path, title, release_date, genre_ids, overview, poster_path, vote_average, id, } = movie; } }; return (

Avengers : Endgame

2019
8.4

Action, Adventure, Drama

After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
